contents.text: Thank you for calling Zapier in San Francisco, where we help you automate your work by connecting over a thousand apps in minutes.
For sales and onboarding new integrations, press 1.
For pricing, plans, and billing inquiries, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for pricing and plan details.

navigationGoals: Review pricing tiers and choose the best Zapier plan for my team
I’d like to review your pricing tiers and pick the best plan for my small nonprofit.
Review detailed pricing tiers and billing options for high-volume API usage
Help me understand the different subscription plans and choose the right one
Ask about student discount options for a Zapier plan to support my research workflows

contents.text: For assistance with setting up a new integration, press 2.
Thank you for your patience. A product specialist will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Get step-by-step help setting up a new app integration
I need help setting up a Zap that sends my Typeform survey responses into a Google Sheet.
Configure a custom integration between Salesforce and Slack using Zapier’s API
Walk me through setting up a new app integration step by step
Get assistance setting up an integration between my lab’s data logger and Google Sheets

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
Please hold for our technical support team who will assist with your workflows.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot and fix a broken automation workflow
My Zap that posts new Gmail messages to Slack stopped working and I need assistance fixing it.
Debug a multi-step Zap workflow that’s failing on an HTTP 500 error
Help me troubleshoot a problem with one of my existing automations
Troubleshoot a failure in my automation that uploads experiment results to Google Drive

contents.text: For account management and general inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account services team.

navigationGoals: Update my account’s payment method on file
I want to update my account’s billing information and payment method.
Update account contact details and enable two-factor authentication on my Zapier account
Assist me with updating my account details or resetting my password
Update my billing information and switch to invoicing through my university account
